SQL.LOAD: SELECT webservice_id, function_name, on_line_id, off_line_message, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, last_operation_date, ws_function_id FROM elp_ws_functions WHERE ws_function_id = :ws_function_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT ws_function_id, function_name, on_line_id, GetCodeFromListItem(on_line_id) on_line, off_line_message, case when last_operation_date is null then null else (select USER_NAME from ELP_USER where NETWORK_ID = f.modified_by) end as last_change_by, last_operation_date, webservice_id FROM elp_ws_functions f WHERE webservice_id = :webservice_id order by function_name
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_ws_functions SET webservice_id = :webservice_id, function_name = :function_name, on_line_id = :on_line_id, off_line_message = :off_line_message, modified_by = :modified_by, last_operation_date = :last_operation_date WHERE ws_function_id = :ws_function_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_ws_functions ( webservice_id, function_name, on_line_id, off_line_message, created_by, ws_function_id, last_operation_date ) VALUES ( :webservice_id, :function_name, :on_line_id, :off_line_message, :created_by, :ws_function_id, :last_operation_date )
